document_data.name: Frizzerfraz
document_data.mainbody: '''Frizzerfrazz''' was a young [[gold dragon]] living in the [[Aphrunn Mountains]] in [[Turmish]] in [[1358 DR]] and [[1374 DR]].
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], Frizzerfrazz was attacked by a group of [[wyvern]]s controlled by [[Muktar]]'s army. He was saved by his parents [[Wizzerrazz]] and [[Izzerazz]], possibly with the assistance of some adventurers.
